data.title: Wilton Hoggatt Obituary - Ferriday, Louisiana
data.meta_description: We have years of experience caring for families, from all walks of life. Each family comes to us because they know we are leaders in our profession, dedicated to excellence in service, and have the highest integrity.
data.text:
Funeral services for Wilton Ernest Hoggatt, 90, of Wisner, LA will be held at Holly Grove Baptist Church on Wednesday, January 21, 2009 at 11:00 AM with Rev. Mickey Gallup officiating. Interment will follow at Holly Grove Cemetery under the direction of Young's Community Memorial Funeral Home in Winnsboro.

Wilton Hoggatt was born November 07, 1918 in Wisner, LA and passed away Friday January 16, 2009 at St Francis Medical Center in Monroe. He was married to Mamae Hoggatt whom he loved to his dying day. He had 3 children, Tessa, Eric, and Donna. He was a very industrious man. He had been a Teacher, a Coach, a Principal, a farmer, and a rancher.He served as deacon at the Holly Grove Baptist Church. He loved God, his wife, children, family and horses. He served his country in the U. S. Army.

He was preceded in Death by:

Father-Wilton Roderick Hoggatt

Mother-Lishie Belle (Humble) Hoggatt

Wife-Mamae (Allbritton) Hoggatt

Sisters-Orrean Mason and Nan Keener

Brother-Boyce Hoggatt

Survivors include:

Daughter-Donna Lea Rombs and husband Ronnie of Alvin, TX

Son-Eric Hoggatt and wife Vickie of Mississippi

Daughter-Tessa Albritton and husband Tim of Haughton, LA

3 Brothers-Virgil Hoggatt of Vidalia, LA

Sam Hoggatt of Wisner, LA

Raymond Hoggatt of Wisner, LA

Sister-Belle Cascio of Monroe, LA

He was also survived by 9 grandchildren and 6 great grandchildren.

Pallbearers will be Ron Rombs, Kevin Woods, Glenn Byrd, Micah Hoggatt, Warren Hoggatt, and Isaiah Hoggatt.

The family will receive friends at Young's Community Memorial Funeral Home from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM Tuesday, January 20, 2009.

To leave an online condolence for the family please visit www.youngscommunity.com
